title: FIFA World Cup : players with most matches 1930 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.
There is a difference of 5.0 between the maximum Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) and minimum Player Cafu (Brazil).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Player, and Number of appearances in each Player on the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Player in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has the highest Number of appearances and Cafu (Brazil) has the lowest Number of appearances.
There is a difference of 5.0 between the maximum Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) and minimum Player Cafu (Brazil).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of appearances for 10 number of Players.
The maximum Number of appearances 25.0 is found at Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) and the minimum is found at Cafu (Brazil) where Player is 20.0.
The maximum Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) has got 1.25 times higher Number of appearances than the minimum Player Cafu (Brazil).
Number of appearances at Player Lothar Matthäus (Germany) is 25.0 , second place is Miroslav Klose (Germany) at 24.0, and thirdly is Paolo Maldini (Italy) at 23.0.
Player Cafu (Brazil), Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany), Philipp Lahm (Germany), and Grzegorz Lato (Poland) share the same value 20.0.
The lowest value 20.0 at Cafu (Brazil) is almost 1.16 times smaller than the average value 21.5.
